name: H0N0R
description: H0N0R is a cyber platformer made by the developer Jorgen Raygun and some friends. it takes place in 2094, in the cyber city Bastion. you the player, a Robotic Samurai from The Center of Robot Control, or the CRC, are tasked to chase down a Rouge robot named Serdicus. embark on this adventure through the city, and do what you were built to do: Die With H0N0R.
